description.english: Buy every single item in the shop
Get sent back from the dungeon after spending too much time in there
Leave a dungeon without defeating a single enemy
Clean a mine that's been infected
Level up for the first time
Boot up the game after update 2.0
Go somewhere where even your trusted companion won't follow
Go to mine A, the start of your mining adventure
Purchase an item during the collection event
Sell an item in the shop
Receive a placement reward from a monthly contest
